scripts.text: select C_DIPRIVILEGEID,C_DIKESAIID,DIORDERID,DIPROMID,C_DSPRIVILEGENAME,C_DSPRIVILEGENAMEADM,C_DIRIVILEGESHUBETSU,C_DIPRIVILEGEPRC,C_DIPRIVILEGENUM,C_DIPRIVILEGETOTALPRC,C_DIPRIVILEGEEXCLUSIONKBN,C_DIFRONTSORTORDER,C_DSTEKIYOJYOGAIFLG,C_DSTEKIYOKBN,C_DINONDISPFLG,C_DSTEIKITEKIYOFLG,C_DSTSUJOTEKIYOFLG,C_DSNOSHINSHOOUTPUTFLG,C_DSPRESENTSENDKBN,C_DIPOINTREDUCTIONFLG,C_DIPOINTREDUCTIONRATE,C_DIPOINTTARGETPRC,C_DIPOINTGRANTTYPE,C_DIREGDISCTICKETGIVENID,DSPREP,DSREN,DSELIM,DIPREPUSR,DIRENUSR,DIELIMUSR,DIELIMFLG from DCL.c_tbEcPrivilegeKesai A WHERE EXISTS (SELECT DIORDERID FROM DCL.TBECORDER B WHERE DSREN >= to_timestamp('2024-06-07 01:12:48','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND DSREN < to_timestamp('2024-06-07 01:12:57','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND A.DIORDERID = B.DIORDERID )

select A.C_DIPRIVILEGEID,A.C_DIKESAIID,A.DIORDERID,A.DIPROMID,A.C_DSPRIVILEGENAME,A.C_DSPRIVILEGENAMEADM,A.C_DIRIVILEGESHUBETSU,A.C_DIPRIVILEGEPRC,A.C_DIPRIVILEGENUM,A.C_DIPRIVILEGETOTALPRC,A.C_DIPRIVILEGEEXCLUSIONKBN,A.C_DIFRONTSORTORDER,A.C_DSTEKIYOJYOGAIFLG,A.C_DSTEKIYOKBN,A.C_DINONDISPFLG,A.C_DSTEIKITEKIYOFLG,A.C_DSTSUJOTEKIYOFLG,A.C_DSNOSHINSHOOUTPUTFLG,A.C_DSPRESENTSENDKBN,A.C_DIPOINTREDUCTIONFLG,A.C_DIPOINTREDUCTIONRATE,A.C_DIPOINTTARGETPRC,A.C_DIPOINTGRANTTYPE,A.C_DIREGDISCTICKETGIVENID,A.DSPREP,A.DSREN,A.DSELIM,A.DIPREPUSR,A.DIRENUSR,A.DIELIMUSR,A.DIELIMFLG from DCL.c_tbEcPrivilegeKesai A INNER JOIN DCL.TBECORDER B ON A.DIORDERID = B.DIORDERID WHERE B.DSREN >= to_timestamp('2024-06-07 01:12:48','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND B.DSREN < to_timestamp('2024-06-07 01:12:57','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
